Dialogue.Page: Hello player! My name is Vodblink, and I am a member of Team Geswaldo.

DialogueOption.Text: Are you planning to make any more mods in the future?
Who else was in Team Geswaldo?
What was your role in Team Geswaldo?
Did you just refer to me, instead of the hatchling?
Are you planning to make any more mods in the future?
Who else was in Team Geswaldo?
What was your role in Team Geswaldo?
Did you refer to me, instead of the hatchling?

Dialogue.Page: Me and Team Geswaldo made Powerfail, a mod for Jam 5.
In Powerfail you explore a <color=orange>miniature</color> system and learn about a group of Nomai that were there first.
Currently, no, there are no plans for future mods, however there is always a possibility of a future mod for Jam 6, or just as a fun project.
The other team members are: Solec, T3rtu, and Heroplays.
Solec was the coder of Team Geswaldo, and does most of the work. They look a bit like Gabbro in this dimension.
T3rtu makes the models for everything, as well as having most of the ideas for it. They look a lot like your avatar for this world.
Heroplays makes music, and made Powerfail much more lively with some of the songs. They became a chess piece for some reason.

DialogueTree.DialogueNode:
megeswaldo.
I am moral support, as well as the one to keep people on task. (I got into this building on a technicality, I did almost no real modding.)
Entry2

4thwall.
I did! Unlike a lot of people here, I can see past the rectangle called a screen and outside of it! For instance, I can tell by looking at you that you need to go outside and interact with some foliage.
Entry2
